title: A Very Sex with Emily V-Day Mash-Up
itunes:title: A Very Sex with Emily V-Day Mash-Up
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Dr. Emily is giving you a mash-up of all things V-Day! She goes over the origin story of Valentine’s Day, along with some stats and facts on the day, reads letters of lovers’ past, gives some examples on how to make the day...
description:
On today’s show, Dr. Emily is giving you a mash-up of all things V-Day!

She goes over the origin story of Valentine’s Day, along with some stats and facts on the day, reads letters of lovers’ past, gives some examples on how to make the day special, and so much more! From gifts to why hotel sex is the best –– enjoy this mash-up and have a pleasure-filled day – and year – of love!


Follow Emily on all social @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
